name: Cosmic Voyager
description:
Go through your week as part of the crew of a space station orbiting the Cygnus X-1 star. But be careful, things start getting weird pretty quickly..

The game has heavy cosmic horror themes! >:)

Also it's my first game so I don't expect it to do too great but I'm quite happy with it so far! Please comment if you find a bug/have a suggestion, thank you and have fun! ♥
